title: Nicky Hilton sparkles in silver and blue sequined gown while supporting Angel Ball in New York City
text:
Nicky Hilton sparkled in a silver and blue sequined gown Monday at the Angel Ball in New York City.

The 36-year-old socialite spoke during the event at Cipriani Wall Street put on by the Gabrielle's Angel Foundation, which helps advance therapies for leukemia, lymphoma and related cancers.

The gorgeous sleeveless gown by designer Pamella Roland hugged Nicky's hips and brought out the blue in her eyes.

Showing support: Nicky Hilton sparkled in a silver and blue sequined gown Monday at the Angel Ball in New York City

Nicky had her long blonde hair down as she joined auctioneer Harry Santa-Olalla on the stage.

She held up a multi-colored wing-shaped handbag that was being auctioned off.

She earlier took to Instagram and posed with the custom accessory.

'What a dream come true designing a bag with the iconic @JudithLeiberNY! Tonight we will auction off the one-of-a-kind bag at the #AngelBall for cancer research!,' Nicky wrote in the caption for her roughly 1.1 million followers.

Custom bag: The 36-year-old socialite carried a custom handbag being auctioned off at the event

On stage: Nicky took to the stage and spoke during the event at Cipriani Wall Street

Nicky has a three-year-old daughter Lily and one-year-old son Teddy with her husband James Rothschild, 34.

James and Nicky married in July 2015 at The Orangery in Kensington Palace Gardens in London.

Nicky is the younger sister of socialite, DJ and businesswoman Paris Hilton, 38.

Cancer research: The event was hosted by Gabrielle's Angel Foundation, which helps advance therapies for leukemia, lymphoma and related cancers

Social media: Nicky earlier took to Instagram to show off the one-of-a-kind bag that she designed with Judith Leiber

James is the only son of the late Amschel Rothschild who died in 1996 at age 41 in Paris.

He was found hanged at the Hôtel Le Bristol Paris while serving as executive chairman of Rothschild Asset Management of the Rothschild banking family of England.

The Rothschild banking family of England was founded in 1798.
description: The 36-year-old socialite sparkled in a silver and blue sequined gown Monday at the Angel Ball in New York City.
